replies.bodyText: Basically it should be implemented by nested forms. Nested forms have their own renderer and need to propagate the flush call. I decided to have a separate interface instead of reusing IsNestedModel just in case we need that functionallity for other custom form controls (stunner have some dedicated to the propreties panels)
